MS MCQs

    Use Git version-control tools in Visual Studio Code

    »

    1. You want to clone a remote repository to your local machine. What command do you enter in the Visual Studio Code Command Palette?

      pull

      fetch

      synchronize

      clone


    2. What does the Synchronize Changes icon in the Status Bar do?

      A git rebase

      A git pull and a git push

      A git pull only

      A git push only


    3. How do you stage a change in Visual Studio Code?

      Select the plus sign (+) icon in the Source Control view.

      Select the checkmark icon in the Source Control view.

      Select the minus sign (-) icon in the Source Control view.

      Select the plus sign (+) icon in the Status Bar.
